episodes.title: Ep 3: Deadly Influence: From Self-Harm to Murder in Teen Cults
episodes.description:
Episode 3 of Inside 764 reveals how the teen-led 764 cult escalated from online coercion and self-harm challenges to real-world violence and murder. We hear from a parent who lost a daughter at the hands of the cult, as well as the story of the first 764 affiliated murder. 


764 spirals from Discord chatrooms to splinter groups like No Lives Matter: a group where membership requires real-world violence. Experts, journalists, and survivors expose how 764’s deadly influence inspired copycat attacks, terrorist plots, and extreme acts of violence across the US, UK, Sweden, Brazil, and beyond. This episode shows how vulnerable teens are manipulated into committing horrific acts for acceptance and notoriety.


Subscribe and follow Inside 764 to uncover the shocking truth about teen radicalisation, online predators, and the deadly influence of digital cults.

episodes.title: Ep 2: The Dark Net Rises: How Teens Spread Sextortion Worldwide
episodes.description:
Episode 2 exposes the dark rise of 764, the teen-led online cult that turned Discord, Roblox, and Minecraft into hunting grounds for coercion and abuse. Bradley Cadenhead’s network didn’t just groom teens — it pushed victims into self-harm, animal abuse, and real-world crimes, spreading fear and control across the internet.

We investigate the shocking connections to Kaleb Merritt, the CVLT network, and extremist group 09A, revealing how 764’s twisted ideology continues to manipulate young people. Survivors, journalists, and investigators pull back the curtain on the tactics that make this digital cult so dangerous.

Subscribe and follow Inside 764 to uncover the shocking truth about the online predators hiding behind the games your kids love.

**************************

episodes.title: Ep 1: Who is Brad764? America’s Youngest Cult Leader
episodes.description:
Inside 764 untangles the web of a teen-led online cult targeting children through Discord, Roblox, and Minecraft. 

In this first episode, a Discord user operating under the name of ‘Brad764’ is linked to a global sextortion ring. Survivors share their stories, and investigators reveal how a digital cult was built from the bedroom of a teenage boy.

Subscribe and follow Inside 764 for the full investigation into this shocking online cult.

episodes.title: Inside 764: The Most Dangerous Cult You've Never Heard Of
episodes.description:
A cult founded in a kid's bedroom in Texas soon became one of the biggest threats to domestic terror in the US. This is the story of 764.

An Alamo Pictures podcast series in conjunction with Soho Podcasts and WIRED Studios. 

New episodes every week starting December 1st. 

Watch on YouTube & listen anywhere you get your podcasts.
